title: Ex-Stadia Jade Raymond’s Haven Studios acquired by PlayStation
content:
Just one year into its existence, Haven Studios, headed up by Jade Raymond the previous head of Stadia Games & Entertainment, has been acquired by PlayStation.

more…

description: Haven Studios, headed up by Jade Raymond the previous head of Stadia Games & Entertainment, has been acquired by PlayStation.
